content:
Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 30, "index": 25}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 39, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 32}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: The first step in crafting a jungle_fence is to craft jungle_planks. To do so, I need to place 1 stripped_jungle_log in the crafting grid. I will move the log from slot 41 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: jungle_fence
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "golden_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 56, "index": 21}, {"type": "brick_wall", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "orange_concrete_powder", "quantity": 30, "index": 25}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 39, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 11, "index": 32}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can move the jungle_planks from the crafting grid (slot 0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Ok
